DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Scratching Pipelle Pregnancy Rate Unexplained Infertility
DOC.detailed_description: Unexplained infertility ( UI ) term use describe infertile couple standard investigation , include semen analysis , test ovulation tubal patency , fail detect gross abnormality ( Crosignani et al. , 1993 ) . It diagnosis exclusion , almost 30-40 % infertile couple would suffer type subfertility ( Simth et al. , 2003 ) . A diversity cause hypothesize explain condition . Cervical , uterine , ovulatory , peritoneal , immunological , endocrinological , genetic defect reproductive physiology disturbance continuously suggest potential causative factor ( Rov et al. , 2005 ; Shveiky et al. , 2006 ; Bellver et al. , 2008 ; Golubovsky , 2008 ; Woodson , 2008 ) . Empirically , intervention manage unexplained infertility widely practice . These intervention include expectant management , intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) ovarian stimulation vitro fertilization ( El-Toukhy & Khalaf , 2008 ; Bhattachary et al. , 2010 ) . In human , uterus becomes receptive midsecretory phase menstrual cycle ( day 19-23 ) , commonly know window implantation ( WOI ) . It assume inadequate uterine receptivity responsible approximately two-thirds implantation failure ( Simon et al. , 1998 ) . Since impairment endometrial receptivity may cause subfertility group couple diagnose unexplained infertility ( Jasper et al. , 2006 ; Boroujerdnia & Nikbakht , 2008 ; Konac et al. , 2009 ) . Endometrial scratching may help group couple unexplained infertility .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Women diagnose unexplained infertility age 2035y . 2 . Regular menstruation length cycle 2135 day . 3 . Ovulation confirm appropriately time midluteal progesterone . 4 . Fertile semen variable ( accord world health organization criterion 2010 ) . 5 . Bilateral tubal patency ( demonstrate laparoscopy hystrosalpingography ) . 1 Patients age less 20 y. 35y 2 Infertile semen analysis . 3 Abnormal hormonal profile ( FSH level 10 ) . 4 Patient diagnose polycystic ovary ( PCO ) . 5 Medical disorder hypertention , liver renal disease . 6 Endocrinal disorder hyperthyroidism , hypothyroidism diabetes mellitus . 7 Pelvic pathology PID uterine fibroid . 8 No previous history planning IVF . 9 Unwilling comply protocol . 10 Participation another clinical trial last 3 month prior start study .
